text:
hey everyone :wave:

I'm getting an error trying to associate a meeting with a contact:

```meeting_to_contact is not a valid association type between meetings and contacts```
Does anyone know where I can find all of the association types for the association API?

Hi,
I'm looking to map buttons in our App to properties in HubSpot.

Are there any guideline documents that I can use for this or can I post here?

Thank you,

Hi all, I am trying to create call engagements per v3 api and assign it to a contact object, but I have problems with the property `hs_call_callee_object_type_id`? Where can I find the type_id of objects, e.g. contact?

Thanks in advance!

I've opened up a ticket on the HubSpot-api-php github repo: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-php/issues/157> . It's weird that in v3 there is somehow a difference between calls, notes, emails and meetings. The other 3 work fine

I finally figured it out :partyparrot:

It should be:

`meeting_event_to_contact`
`meeting_event_to_company`
`meeting_event_to_deal`
For future reference, I”ve solved this one!

Turns out you have to LOWERCASE all values for the IN operator (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/API-v3-Search-via-custom-property-with-IN-operator-no-result-but/m-p/673381|see here>)

hi guys

I just want to find if we can do the below
• Where a contact is created on HubSpot via contact form, create a new contact on <http://Respond.io|Respond.io> via API
is it possible to retrieve data only newly created contact via form in HubSpot?
